titleStmt.title: The great sale of original paintings, that were design'd to be expos'd on Tuesday next, in Easter week at the new auction-room, next the Earl of Bedfords Gate, Charles-street, Covent-Garden, will not be sold till Friday, in the same week, because they may be seen by the people of quality, that come to the weekly consort of musick on Thursday. And may be seen at all times till then. The sale will begin at two a clock precisely.

The great sale of original paintings, that were design'd to be expos'd on Tuesday next, in Easter week at the new auction-room, next the Earl of Bedfords Gate, Charles-street, Covent-Garden, will not be sold till Friday, in the same week, because they may be seen by the people of quality, that come to the weekly consort of musick on Thursday. And may be seen at all times till then. The sale will begin at two a clock precisely.

publicationStmt.publisher: Catalogues are distributed gratis, at Mr. Manships at the Black-Bull in Corhil; Mr. Richard Parker's at the Piazza under the Royal-Exchange; Mr. Bullord's at the Old Black Bear in StÂ· Pauls Church-yard; Mr. Hargraves at the Kings-Head in Holborn; Mr. Ropers next to the Devil-Tavern at Temple-Bar; Mr. Not's in the Pall-Mall, booksellers; and at the place of sale,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
